tiddler.title: SpecialTiddlers
tiddler.pre:
|AdvancedOptions|This shadow tiddler provides access to several advanced options| |ColorPalette|These values in this shadow tiddler determine the colour scheme of the ~TiddlyWiki user interface| |CreateNewPage|Dialog for creating pages| |DefaultTiddlers|The tiddlers listed in this shadow tiddler will be automatically displayed when ~TiddlyWiki starts up| |DefineGroup|Dialog for defining a user group| |EditTemplate|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler determines how tiddlers look while they are being edited| |EditingMenu|Menu which is inserted into the right sidebar when you have edit rights| |FileList|Auto-generated list of uploaded files| |LibraryUsageHelp|A help file| |LoginDialog|Used the loginDialog macro to present an iFrame that contains the google login dialog| |MainMenu|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the main menu in the left-hand column of the screen| |OptionsPanel|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the options panel slider in the right-hand sidebar| |PageSetup|The top-level tiddler you see here| |PageTemplate|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler determines the overall ~TiddlyWiki layout.
This is a separate concept from the [[Page template|PageTemplateHelp]] mechanism| |PageTemplateHelp|A help file describing the Page templating mechanism| |PluginManager|This shadow tiddler provides access to the plugin manager| |RecentChanges|Auto-genertated list of the most recent changes| |RecentComments|Auto-genertated list of the most recent comments| |SideBarOptions|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the option panel in the right-hand sidebar| |SideBarTabs|This shadow tiddler is used as the contents of the tabs panel in the right-hand sidebar| |SiteMap|Autogenerated map of all pages that have ''//not//'' been tagged as hidden| |SiteSubtitle|This shadow tiddler is used as the second part of the page title^^*^^| |SiteTitle|This shadow tiddler is used as the first part of the page title^^*^^| |SiteUrl|This shadow tiddler should be set to the full target URL for publication| |SpecialEditTemplate|Used as part of the PageSetup dialog| |SpecialViewTemplate|Used as part of the PageSetup dialog| |StyleSheet|This tiddler can contain custom CSS definitions| |StyleSheetColors|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions related to the color of page elements.
''DO NOT EDIT THIS TIDDLER'', instead make your changes in the StyleSheet shadow tiddler| |StyleSheetLayout|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions related to the layout of page elements.
''DO NOT EDIT THIS TIDDLER'', instead make your changes in the StyleSheet shadow tiddler| |StyleSheetLocale|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions related to the translation locale| |StyleSheetPrint|This shadow tiddler contains CSS definitions for printing| |TabAll|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'All' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |TabMore|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'More' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |TabMoreMissing|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Missing' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |TabMoreOrphans|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Orphans' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |TabMoreShadowed|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Shadowed' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |TabTags|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Tags' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |TabTimeline|This shadow tiddler contains the contents of the 'Timeline' tab in the right-hand sidebar| |ToolbarCommands|This shadow tiddler determines which commands are shown in tiddler toolbars| |UploadDialog|Presents a file upload dialog| |UserMenu|Appears at the top of the right sidebar when (having logged in) you click your username| |UserProfile|Dialog for defining personal settings| |ViewOnlyTemplate|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler is used for presenting system dialogs| |ViewTemplate|The HTML template in this shadow tiddler determines how tiddlers look|
(*: SiteTitle & SiteSubtitle: use these if you want the changes to be versioned, otherwise set these via the PageProperties)
